title: Farm work forging. No. 1. Forging with a hand forge
creator_credit: United States. Office of Education, H Woodard and F.E. Brooker
brief_description: How to clean the Tuyere and build an open fire in a forge; how to maintain the fire and coke the coal; how to lay out and mark the stock; how to heat mild steel for forging; how to forge an eye.
